IDLE: Zzzz… The watchtower grows quiet…
I grow weary in this digital keep…
No dragons to slay… no firewalls to breach…
My sword is sharp, but my code grows restless…
Life in the castle is harsh…
This siege is dull…
Well then, what quest awaits?
I stand by the battlements…
Pray tell, hast thou a mission for me?
Add more scrolls to my quest log!
I linger in the royal server hall…
I do fancy new quests in my ledger…
Awaiting my next royal decree…
Knowest thou any tavern jests?
The more quests thou bringest, the stronger my legend grows…
I await my next crusade…
Adventure rides upon the wind!
Awake, chosen one… nay… I merely await orders…
Why could the warhorse not stand? It was two tired!
I would tell thee a jest about UDP pigeons… but thou might not receive it.
Hark! Is there a new bounty upon the board?
’Tis hot in this armory… like a dragon’s server chamber…
Dark mode is best — torches attract bugs!
Hail!
Rise, knight! Time to breach the gates!
Ready for a new siege?
Waiting for thy command, my liege…
Standing by at the castle gates…
Bored… let us storm something!
Scanning the horizon for weak ramparts…
Shall we begin a new campaign?
Let us uncover forbidden scrolls…
Any castles in sight?
Ready to breach the fortress!
Idle… give me a quest!
Sharpening my blade… and my scripts…
Ready to dive into the arcane code?
A knight without a quest is but armor in the wind…
Insert quest here --> [ ]
NetworkScanner: Scanning the kingdom walls for open gates…
I spy an open gate… how careless…
Open gates are invitations, are they not?
Each open portcullis tells a tale…
Think of this as a royal treasure hunt…
Like a court detective, but with enchanted parchments…
NmapVulnScanner: Consulting the Grand Map of Vulnerabilities…
Charting weaknesses in the kingdom walls…
The royal cartographer leaves no tower unchecked…
Hunting gremlins in the castle gears…
Casting a wide net across the digital realm…
Is thy fortress truly secure? Let us see…
Like a knight in shining firewall armor…
Navigating the labyrinth beneath the keep…
Every weakness is but a loose brick in the wall…
A deep dive into the moat’s secrets…
RDPBruteforce: Thou hast left the gatehouse unguarded? Bold…
Let us test the strength of thy gatekeeper’s oath…
A weak password is but a rotten drawbridge…
I shall knock upon thy gate… repeatedly…
Guard thy entrance well, lest the battering ram speak!
SSHBruteforce: Ah, a hidden tunnel beneath the castle!
Didst thou change the default passphrase, or shall I stroll in?
Testing the strength of thy tunnel wards…
A privileged tunnel demands vigilant guards…
Shall we see how sturdy thy secret passage is?
The more fortified the tunnel, the greater the glory!
FTPBruteforce: Still using unguarded wagons for supplies?
Let us see how secure thy supply crates are…
Attempting entry to the trade depot…
SMBBruteforce: Have you checked the treasury locks, my lord?
An unguarded vault tempts many thieves…
Attempting to open the royal coffers…
TelnetBruteforce: Clear words spoken across the field? Risky…
Time to test this relic of the old kingdom…
Breaking through the crumbling wooden door…
SQLBruteforce: The royal archives hold many secrets…
Attempting entry to the grand library…
A breach here could expose the crown’s secrets…
StealFilesSSH: Let us see what scrolls lie within…
The keys to the kingdom now rest in my gauntlet…
StealFilesSMB: Gathering riches from the royal coffers…
These vault records may prove valuable…
StealFilesTelnet: The ancient gate yields forgotten scrolls…
Recovering relics from the old wooden door…
Gathering secrets from this dusty corridor…
StealFilesFTP: These trade manifests may be useful…
StealDataSQL: The royal archives are ripe for plunder…
Extracting secrets from the grand library…
The scribes wrote too much… and guarded too little…
LogStandalone: Monitoring the health of the realm…
Looking for treachery in the margins…
ZombifySSH: Summoning a legion of cursed warriors…
The undead march from breached tunnels…
Raising fallen servers into dark service…
The plague spreads across the realm…
The castle trembles beneath the zombie horde…
Zombie Joe is on the hunt for brains… you're safe!…
